snippet.title: Bloobs Adventure Idle Steam Trailer Wish List Now
snippet.description:
Wishlist Bloobs Adventure Idle !!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2942780/Bloobs_Adventure_Idle/

To play Bloobs Adventure Idle !!
https://dev-bloob.itch.io/bloobsadventureidle

Support Bloobs Adventure Idle
🚀https://patreon.com/BloobsAdventureIdle?utm_medium=clipboard_copy&utm_source=copyLink&utm_campaign=creatorshare_creator&utm_content=join_link

🌟 Join the Adventure on Discord!
👉 https://discord.com/invite/zdjA4E9S92

Embark on the Idle journey as we shape Bloobs Adventure Idle, a Unity-powered pixel art experience. Join our vibrant community of game development enthusiasts for exclusive DevLogs, discussions on Idle Game mechanics, and first-hand insights into the creative process behind Bloobs.


🚀 Let the Idle Begin!
Welcome aboard! Together, let's craft Bloobs Adventure Idle into a Unity-driven pixel art sensation. Dive into our Discord for engaging discussions on game development, behind-the-scenes DevLogs, and the intricate world of idle gaming. Your input is key as we collectively bring Bloobs to life!

🐦 Follow the journey on Twitter
👉 https://twitter.com/Simple_Studio_

Stay in the loop with real-time updates, behind-the-scenes glimpses, and exciting reveals. Follow us on Twitter @Simple_Studio_ for an exclusive pass to the Unity-powered, pixel-perfect adventure that is Bloobs Adventure Idle.

Let's make Bloobs Adventure Idle the best it can be—together!

For fantastic art, go ahead and check out https://clockworkraven.itch.io/

For all DevLog's, watch the adventure unravel 
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtnnIbKHQ3gLjgAkgb78PS4wp5B-hro1h

🚀🎮 #BloobsAdventureIdle #GamingCommunity #IndieGameDev #Unity #PixelArt #IdleGame #GameDevelopment #DevLog
